ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: -Learned how to have a very basic conversation in portugues
I really learned so much Portuguese in such a short amount of time- learning about Brazilian culture, being able to read a book in Portuguese, and speaking basic phrases.
I learned a lot about the culture and lives of people within the Lusophone world. I also learned some basic vocabulary, grammar, and phrases and by the end was putting full sentences together.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The course provides an amazing way to learn the language because you engage with songs and movies that also allow you to learn a lot about the culture.
The course is good to understand Portuguese, but it would have been helpful to also have a workbook to go over vocabulary and to reference.
it could be improved by teaching more vocab
Daily work was a bit monotonous. Would have appreciated more structure on learning verbs and specific concepts, maybe some worksheets. Otherwise the content was interesting

This course was very interesting and was far from the typical very boring language courses, but I personally would benefit from a little more time spent repeating grammar, maybe with quick worksheets or practice with a partner.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to learn a language at Yale, particularly if you know Spanish.
I would definitely recommend. It is a pretty easy course that is super fun!

Yes, I would, if you're not sure what language to take or are slightly interested in Portuguese, then I would recommend this course. Even though I personally did struggle with speaking, I did learn a lot about every aspect of the language.
